general.title: General
general.appUpdatesDesc: Keep OpenWhispr up to date with the latest features and improvements.
general.dictationHotkeyDesc: Configure the key you press to start and stop voice dictation.
general.pressKeyDesc: Press this key from anywhere to start/stop dictation

hotkey.errorDesc: This key could not be registered. Please choose a different key.

general.clickToRecord: Click to record. Press any key combination to set it as your dictation hotkey.
general.aboutDesc: OpenWhispr converts speech to text using OpenAI's Whisper model on your device or via cloud.
general.interfaceLanguageDesc: Choose your preferred language for the application interface.
general.removeModelsDesc: Delete locally cached Whisper models to free up disk space.

ai.title: AI Models
ai.enableDesc: Use AI to automatically improve transcription quality
ai.cloudDesc: Advanced models via API. Fast and capable, requires internet.
ai.localDesc: Runs on your device. Complete privacy, works offline.

dialogs.accessibilitySuccessDesc: Accessibility permissions working! Check if the test text appeared in another app.

transcription.title: Transcription
transcription.micAccessNeeded: Microphone access is needed to list devices.
transcription.cloudWhisperDetail: Audio sent to OpenAI servers. Faster processing, requires API key.
transcription.localWhisperDetail: Audio stays on your device. Complete privacy, works offline.
transcription.cloudNote: Requests for cloud transcription use this OpenAI-compatible base URL.

aiModels.title: AI Models
aiModels.enhancementDesc: Configure how AI models clean up and format your transcriptions. This handles commands like 'scratch that', creates proper lists, and fixes obvious errors while preserving your natural tone.

agentConfig.title: Agent Config
agentConfig.agentNameDesc: Customize your AI assistant's name and behavior to make interactions more personal and effective.
agentConfig.tip1: Say 'Hey {name}, write a formal email' for specific instructions
agentConfig.tip2: Use 'Hey {name}, format this as a list' for text enhancement
agentConfig.tip3: The agent will recognize when you're addressing it directly
agentConfig.nameHint: Choose a name that feels natural to say and remember
agentConfig.ex1: 'Hey {name}, write an email to my team'
agentConfig.ex3: Regular dictation: 'This is just normal text'

prompts.title: AI Prompt Management
prompts.desc: View and customize the prompts that power OpenWhispr's AI text processing.
prompts.current_desc: These are the exact prompts currently being sent to your AI models. Understanding these helps you see how OpenWhispr thinks!
prompts.customize_desc: Edit these prompts to change how your AI behaves. Use {{agentName}} and {{text}} as placeholders.
prompts.test_desc: Test your custom prompts with the actual AI model to see real results.
prompts.test_input_placeholder: Enter text to test with your custom prompts...

controlPanel.pressHotkey: Press your hotkey to start recording and create your first transcription.

dialogs.resetOnboardingDesc: Are you sure you want to reset the onboarding process? This will clear your setup and show the welcome flow again.
dialogs.cleanDataDesc: This will permanently delete ALL OpenWhispr data including database, settings, and models. This action cannot be undone.
dialogs.removeModelsDesc: This deletes all locally cached Whisper models and frees disk space.
dialogs.clearHistoryDesc: Are you certain you wish to clear all inscribed records? This action cannot be undone.
dialogs.deleteTranscriptionDesc: Are you certain you wish to remove this inscription from your records?
